lines.text: Signor Foy, we are going to have a baby.
I wanted to tell you, Eddie, but Clara said to wait.
If you're interested, it happened in Capri.
...Oh, well, thank you. Thank you, one and all. It is nice of you to let me im on it. There any other late bulletins?
You seem to know everything! What's it gonna be - a boy or a girl?
It's one thing we're getting through customs!
I love him when he gets angry. And he gets angry all the time. How many women can love their husband all the time?
Anybody in New Rochelle would be happy to leave New Rochelle.
What do you need friends for?... you've got all the friends and enemies you need right here in the family.
